title: Cannot access runes, missions or summoner icons in new patch 7.22... anyone else? @Riot

replies.body: Hey, our network team has been investigating an issue for EUW players trying to access Hextech Loot.  It's possible that the other issues being reported here is a result of working towards a fix.  Can I get more info on errors you're getting specifically when accessing content on the client?  It's likely that this will resolve on it's own, but I'm happy to take in more info!

under the Collection tab and clicking on champions a circle spins in the center of the screen forever. under the emotes tab everything appears normally. Under the Runes tab spinning circle and it is located on top left of the screen. spells tab and items tab also appear normal.

This is also true for my main AND smurf account, but not for my brother on either of his accounts, we are sharing connection.
_(infos to investigate on the issue)_
just resolved itself everythings working now, thank you

in my case; I can access the client fine, but when I try to access the champions and runes pages in the collection tab, it keeps loading in an infinite loop. If I try to access loot, and the store, same thing happens. If i try to start a game, I can pick my champion just fine, but the runes tab in champ select has a red box around it, and it says nothing. Then when I try to click it, a loading symbol pops up again, stuck infinitely as well

> [{quoted}](name=Abstraction,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vng2PmQw,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:38:53.380+0000)
>
> in my case; I can access the client fine, but when I try to access the champions and runes pages in the collection tab, it keeps loading in an infinite loop. If I try to access loot, and the store, same thing happens. If i try to start a game, I can pick my champion just fine, but the runes tab in champ select has a red box around it, and it says nothing. Then when I try to click it, a loading symbol pops up again, stuck infinitely as well

I have all of these as well, also when trying to change icon there are none to choose from.
So the mission said I got the Defender of League emote but I can't find it anywhere. It isn't in loot or under my emotes.
Same here, I'm having the same exact problems as you :/
Bump - Also need help with this :(
Same problem , cant even select runes to play

after starting a training game and leaving it, most of my issues fixed themselves, weirdly enough. But I still can't edit runes, it just gets stuck loading again. at least I can select runes now in champ select, so progress has been made x)
